Error Handling

GeminiSDR Error Handling and Recovery System

This module provides comprehensive error handling with severity levels, context tracking, and recovery strategies for the GeminiSDR system.

class geminisdr.core.error_handling.ErrorSeverity(*values)[source]

Bases: Enum

Error severity levels for categorizing and handling different types of errors.

LOW = 'low'
MEDIUM = 'medium'
HIGH = 'high'
CRITICAL = 'critical'

Bases: object

Centralized error handling and recovery system with pluggable recovery strategies.

__init__(logger: Logger | None = None)[source]
register_recovery_strategy(error_type: Type[Exception], strategy: Callable[[Exception, ErrorContext], bool]) → None[source]

Register a recovery strategy for a specific error type.

Parameters:

  • error_type – The exception type to handle

  • strategy – Callable that takes (error, context) and returns success boolean

handle_error(error: Exception, context: ErrorContext | None = None) → bool[source]

Handle an error with appropriate recovery strategies.

Parameters:

  • error – The exception to handle

  • context – Additional context information

Returns:

True if error was successfully recovered, False otherwise

Return type:

bool

error_context(operation: str, component: str = None, **context_data)[source]

Context manager for error handling with automatic recovery.

Parameters:

  • operation – Name of the operation being performed

  • component – Component name where operation is happening

  • **context_data – Additional context data

get_error_statistics() → Dict[str, Any][source]

Get statistics about recent errors.

geminisdr.core.error_handling.retry_with_backoff(max_retries: int = 3, base_delay: float = 1.0, max_delay: float = 60.0, backoff_factor: float = 2.0, exceptions: tuple = (<class 'Exception'>, ))[source]

Decorator for automatic retry with exponential backoff.

Parameters:

  • max_retries – Maximum number of retry attempts

  • base_delay – Initial delay between retries in seconds

  • max_delay – Maximum delay between retries in seconds

  • backoff_factor – Multiplier for delay after each retry

  • exceptions – Tuple of exception types to retry on

geminisdr.core.error_handling.fallback_to_simulation(logger: Logger | None = None)[source]

Context manager that falls back to simulation mode on hardware errors.

Parameters:

logger – Optional logger for recording fallback events

ErrorHandler

class geminisdr.core.error_handling.ErrorHandler(logger: Logger | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Centralized error handling and recovery system with pluggable recovery strategies.

Centralized error handling system with automatic recovery strategies.

Example usage:

from geminisdr.core.error_handling import ErrorHandler

error_handler = ErrorHandler(config)

# Use error context for automatic handling
with error_handler.error_context("model_loading"):
    model = load_model("my_model")
__init__(logger: Logger | None = None)[source]
register_recovery_strategy(error_type: Type[Exception], strategy: Callable[[Exception, ErrorContext], bool]) → None[source]

Register a recovery strategy for a specific error type.

Parameters:

  • error_type – The exception type to handle

  • strategy – Callable that takes (error, context) and returns success boolean

handle_error(error: Exception, context: ErrorContext | None = None) → bool[source]

Handle an error with appropriate recovery strategies.

Parameters:

  • error – The exception to handle

  • context – Additional context information

Returns:

True if error was successfully recovered, False otherwise

Return type:

bool

Functions and Decorators

retry_with_backoff

geminisdr.core.error_handling.retry_with_backoff(max_retries: int = 3, base_delay: float = 1.0, max_delay: float = 60.0, backoff_factor: float = 2.0, exceptions: tuple = (<class 'Exception'>, ))[source]

Decorator for automatic retry with exponential backoff.

Parameters:

  • max_retries – Maximum number of retry attempts

  • base_delay – Initial delay between retries in seconds

  • max_delay – Maximum delay between retries in seconds

  • backoff_factor – Multiplier for delay after each retry

  • exceptions – Tuple of exception types to retry on

Decorator for automatic retry with exponential backoff on transient failures.

logger – Optional logger for recording fallback events

Context manager that automatically falls back to simulation mode on hardware errors.
